name: ProgrammeTV
description: This module get the French television programs (the first part of the evening) .
instructionsHTML:
Requirement

Need Gladys version >= 3.0.0.

Installation

  • Install the module in Gladys in the store.
  • Reboot Gladys.
  • Go in global parameters in Gladys. Change this parameter to exclude channels of the parsing.
    • PROGRAMMETV_CHAINES_EXCLUES : TF1,France 2

How to use

For example, to speak on a Sonos :

gladys.modules.programmetv.exec()
    .then(programmes => {
        var texte = '';
        var nomChaines = Object.getOwnPropertyNames(programmes);
        for (var i = 0; i < nomChaines.length; i++) {
            texte += `Sur ${nomChaines[i]}/`;
            texte += `${programmes[nomChaines[i]].nomProgramme}/`;
            texte += `${programmes[nomChaines[i]].typeProgramme}.`;
        }

        return gladys.modules['speak-sonos'].say({language : 'fr', text : texte, device : 2});
    });
